main.name: Arjun Singh
main.description: I am a certified full stack web developer with a degree in business marketing from Loyola University Maryland. I am looking to start my career and would eventualy like to work in the world of sports or esports marketing
main.bio: I am a recent college graduate who is looking to start his career in marketing.  After completing a online course and receiving a certification in web development, I have started to work with my father and his business partner to design and create a website for their company. I just moved to Arizona where I spend most of my time watching movies, playing games, and hanging out with my family.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact, please reach out to me or fill out the form below.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skills and my proficiency with them

education.description: Received a BBA in business marketing. Spent one semester learning about Disney's consumer engagement and then learned hands on in Disney in Orlando, FL
Received a certification in full stack web development

work.title: Sports PR Intern
work.description: Wrote copy and assisted in finding user generated content to post on KT Tape (therapeutic kinesiology tape manufacturer) Facebook and Instagram accounts

work.title: Marketing Intern
work.description: Conducted research and data analysis on consumer activations for the National Australia Bank (NAB) and weekly Australian Football League (AFL) Rising Star awards to assess effectiveness of marketing strategy. Provided insight on social media platforms like Twitch and Spotify to inform client usage of these channels

projects.title: Note Taker

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.category: Track workouts by adding exercises and stats

projects.title: Twitch Clips
